comment: I tried the Euco-Mint Cream and it worked like a charm. No more dry skin anywhere in my body
My skin has been feeling chafed but after I used the Green Tea Revitalizing Cream, my skin has been feeling incredibly smooth
Great and affordable skin cream and body wash product.
